ViewObject.Name: ODHzPuiDQMSrchResultsVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT distinct ps.party_site_id, hp.party_id, hp.party_name, (CASE (select count(1) from hz_cust_accounts hca where hca.party_id = hp.party_id and rownum = 1 and status = 'A') WHEN 0 THEN 'P'||hp.party_number ELSE (select ORIG_SYSTEM_REFERENCE from hz_cust_accounts where party_id = hp.party_id and rownum =1 AND status = 'A') END) Prospect, ps.party_site_number, hz_utility_v2pub.get_all_purposes(ps.party_site_id) site_use_type, ' ' address_key, (SELECT ( CASE NVL(address_style,'-9X9Y9Z') WHEN 'AS_DEFAULT' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address4 || '.' || state || '.' || county || '.' || city || '.' || postal_code WHEN '-9X9Y9Z' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address4 || '.' || state || '.' || county || '.' || city || '.' || postal_code WHEN 'JP' THEN postal_code || '.' || state || '.' || city || '.' || address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address_lines_phonetic WHEN 'NE' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || state || '.' || postal_code || '.' || city WHEN 'POSTAL_ADDR_DEF' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address4 || '.' || city || '.' || county || '.' || state || '.' || province || '.' || postal_code WHEN 'POSTAL_ADDR_US' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address4 || '.' || city || '.' || county || '.' || state || '.' || postal_code WHEN 'SA' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || city || '.' || province || '.' || state || '.' || county || '.' || postal_code WHEN 'SE' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || postal_code || '.' || city || '.' || state WHEN 'UAA' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || city || '.' || state || '.' || postal_code WHEN 'AS_DEFAULT_CA' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || city || '.' || province || '.' || postal_code ELSE address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address4 || '.' || state || '.' || county || '.' || city || '.' || postal_code END ) FROM hz_locations WHERE location_id = ps.location_id) address, (CASE (select count(1) from hz_cust_accounts hca where hca.party_id = hp.party_id and rownum = 1 and status = 'A') WHEN 0 THEN ps.party_site_number ELSE (SUBSTR(ps.orig_system_reference,instr(ps.orig_system_reference,'-')+1,(instr(ps.orig_system_reference,'-',1,2)-instr(ps.orig_system_reference,'-'))-1)) END) site_seq_num, (select email_address FROM hz_contact_points HZCP WHERE ps.party_site_id = HZCP.OWNER_TABLE_ID AND HZCP.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' and HZCP.OWNER_TABLE_NAME = 'HZ_PARTY_SITES' and ((email_address is not null) or (email_address <> '')) and rownum = 1) email, (select (PHONE_COUNTRY_CODE||PHONE_AREA_CODE||PHONE_NUMBER||PHONE_EXTENSION)pphone from hz_contact_points HZCP where ps.party_site_id = HZCP.OWNER_TABLE_ID AND HZCP.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' and HZCP.OWNER_TABLE_NAME = 'HZ_PARTY_SITES' and PHONE_LINE_TYPE = 'GEN' and ((PHONE_NUMBER is not null) or (PHONE_NUMBER <> '')) and rownum = 1) pphone, (CASE SIGN((SELECT COUNT (1) FROM xx_tm_nam_terr_curr_assign_v terr_vw, JTF_RS_ROLES_B ROLE_DET, jtf_rs_role_relations ROLE_ASSIGN, JTF_RS_RESOURCE_EXTNS RESOURCE_DET WHERE RESOURCE_DET.resource_id = terr_vw.resource_id AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_ID = RESOURCE_DET.RESOURCE_ID AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_ID = ROLE_DET.ROLE_ID AND terr_vw.entity_id = ps.party_site_id AND terr_vw.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' AND role_det.attribute15 = 'BSD' AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_TYPE = 'RS_INDIVIDUAL' )) WHEN 1 THEN ( SELECT RESOURCE_DET.source_name s_name FROM xx_tm_nam_terr_curr_assign_v terr_vw, JTF_RS_RESOURCE_EXTNS RESOURCE_DET, JTF_RS_ROLE_RELATIONS ROLE_ASSIGN, JTF_RS_ROLES_B ROLE_DET WHERE RESOURCE_DET.resource_id = terr_vw.resource_id AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_ID = RESOURCE_DET.RESOURCE_ID AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_ID = ROLE_DET.ROLE_ID AND terr_vw.entity_id = ps.party_site_id AND terr_vw.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' AND role_det.attribute15 = 'BSD' AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_TYPE = 'RS_INDIVIDUAL' AND rownum = 1) ELSE ( SELECT RESOURCE_DET.source_name s_name FROM xx_tm_nam_terr_curr_assign_v terr_vw, JTF_RS_RESOURCE_EXTNS RESOURCE_DET, JTF_RS_ROLE_RELATIONS ROLE_ASSIGN, JTF_RS_ROLES_B ROLE_DET WHERE RESOURCE_DET.resource_id = terr_vw.resource_id AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_ID = RESOURCE_DET.RESOURCE_ID AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_ID = ROLE_DET.ROLE_ID AND terr_vw.entity_id = ps.party_site_id AND terr_vw.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' AND role_det.attribute14 = 'BDM' AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_TYPE = 'RS_INDIVIDUAL' AND rownum = 1) END) primary_sales_person, (CASE NVL(sitedemov.SITEDEMO_CANCROSS,'-9X9Y9Z') WHEN '-9X9Y9Z' THEN '*'||hp.Attribute1 ELSE sitedemov.SITEDEMO_CANCROSS END) can_cross_sell, (CASE NVL(sitedemov.SITEDEMO_CONTACTFREQ,'-9X9Y9Z') WHEN '-9X9Y9Z' THEN '*'||hp.Attribute2 ELSE sitedemov.SITEDEMO_CONTACTFREQ END) conct_freq, (CASE NVL(to_char(sitedemov.SITEDEMO_WCW),'-9X9Y9Z') WHEN '-9X9Y9Z' THEN '*'||hp.Attribute10 ELSE to_char(sitedemov.SITEDEMO_WCW) END) white_collar_wrk, hp.party_type, hp.party_number, hp.tax_reference, hp.jgzz_fiscal_code taxPayer_id, hp.duns_number_c duns_number, hp.known_as known_as, hp.known_as2 known_as2, hp.known_as3 known_as3, hp.known_as4 known_as4, hp.known_as5 known_as5, hp.organization_name_phonetic, hp.person_first_name_phonetic, hp.person_last_name_phonetic, ps.location_id, terr.territory_short_name country, hp.url primary_url, fnd2.meaning certification_level_meaning, mpsg.score, (mpsg.score||'%') percentage, 'N' Select_flag, 'N' disable_hgrid_flag, 'Y' enable_hgrid_flag, ' ' source_system FROM hz_parties hp, hz_party_sites ps, fnd_territories_vl terr, fnd_lookup_values fnd2, hz_matched_party_sites_gt mpsg, hz_matched_parties_gt mpg, XX_CDH_S_EXT_SITEDEMO_V sitedemov WHERE mpsg.search_context_id = :1 and mpg.search_context_id = :2 and mpsg.party_id = hp.party_id and mpg.party_id = mpsg.party_id and hp.party_type in ('PERSON', 'ORGANIZATION') and mpsg.party_site_id = ps.party_site_id and ps.party_id = hp.party_id and ps.party_site_id = sitedemov.party_site_id(+) and hp.country = terr.territory_code(+) and hp.status = 'A' and ps.status = 'A' and fnd2.lookup_type(+) = 'HZ_PARTY_CERT_LEVEL' and fnd2.language(+) = userenv('LANG') and fnd2.lookup_code(+) = hp.certification_level union all SELECT distinct ps.party_site_id, hp.party_id, hp.party_name, (CASE (select count(1) from hz_cust_accounts hca where hca.party_id = hp.party_id and rownum = 1 and status = 'A') WHEN 0 THEN 'P'||hp.party_number ELSE (select ORIG_SYSTEM_REFERENCE from hz_cust_accounts where party_id = hp.party_id and rownum = 1 AND status = 'A') END) Prospect, ps.party_site_number, hz_utility_v2pub.get_all_purposes(ps.party_site_id) site_use_type, ' ' address_key, (SELECT ( CASE NVL(address_style,'-9X9Y9Z') WHEN 'AS_DEFAULT' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address4 || '.' || state || '.' || county || '.' || city || '.' || postal_code WHEN '-9X9Y9Z' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address4 || '.' || state || '.' || county || '.' || city || '.' || postal_code WHEN 'JP' THEN postal_code || '.' || state || '.' || city || '.' || address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address_lines_phonetic WHEN 'NE' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || state || '.' || postal_code || '.' || city WHEN 'POSTAL_ADDR_DEF' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address4 || '.' || city || '.' || county || '.' || state || '.' || province || '.' || postal_code WHEN 'POSTAL_ADDR_US' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address4 || '.' || city || '.' || county || '.' || state || '.' || postal_code WHEN 'SA' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || city || '.' || province || '.' || state || '.' || county || '.' || postal_code WHEN 'SE' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || postal_code || '.' || city || '.' || state WHEN 'UAA' THEN address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || city || '.' || state || '.' || postal_code ELSE address1 || '.' || address2 || '.' || address3 || '.' || address4 || '.' || state || '.' || county || '.' || city || '.' || postal_code END ) FROM hz_locations WHERE location_id = ps.location_id) address, (CASE (select count(1) from hz_cust_accounts hca where hca.party_id = hp.party_id and rownum = 1 and status = 'A') WHEN 0 THEN ps.party_site_number ELSE (SUBSTR(ps.orig_system_reference,instr(ps.orig_system_reference,'-')+1,(instr(ps.orig_system_reference,'-',1,2)-instr(ps.orig_system_reference,'-'))-1)) END) site_seq_num, (select email_address FROM hz_contact_points HZCP WHERE ps.party_site_id = HZCP.OWNER_TABLE_ID AND HZCP.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' and HZCP.OWNER_TABLE_NAME = 'HZ_PARTY_SITES' and ((email_address is not null) or (email_address <> '')) and rownum = 1) email, (select (PHONE_COUNTRY_CODE||PHONE_AREA_CODE||PHONE_NUMBER||PHONE_EXTENSION)pphone from hz_contact_points HZCP where ps.party_site_id = HZCP.OWNER_TABLE_ID AND HZCP.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' and HZCP.OWNER_TABLE_NAME = 'HZ_PARTY_SITES' and PHONE_LINE_TYPE = 'GEN' and ((PHONE_NUMBER is not null) or (PHONE_NUMBER <> '')) and rownum = 1) pphone, (CASE SIGN((SELECT COUNT (1) FROM xx_tm_nam_terr_curr_assign_v terr_vw, JTF_RS_ROLES_B ROLE_DET, jtf_rs_role_relations ROLE_ASSIGN, JTF_RS_RESOURCE_EXTNS RESOURCE_DET WHERE RESOURCE_DET.resource_id = terr_vw.resource_id AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_ID = RESOURCE_DET.RESOURCE_ID AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_ID = ROLE_DET.ROLE_ID AND terr_vw.entity_id = ps.party_site_id AND terr_vw.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' AND role_det.attribute15 = 'BSD' AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_TYPE = 'RS_INDIVIDUAL' )) WHEN 1 THEN ( SELECT RESOURCE_DET.source_name s_name FROM xx_tm_nam_terr_curr_assign_v terr_vw, JTF_RS_RESOURCE_EXTNS RESOURCE_DET, JTF_RS_ROLE_RELATIONS ROLE_ASSIGN, JTF_RS_ROLES_B ROLE_DET WHERE RESOURCE_DET.resource_id = terr_vw.resource_id AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_ID = RESOURCE_DET.RESOURCE_ID AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_ID = ROLE_DET.ROLE_ID AND terr_vw.entity_id = ps.party_site_id AND terr_vw.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' AND role_det.attribute15 = 'BSD' AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_TYPE = 'RS_INDIVIDUAL' AND rownum = 1) ELSE ( SELECT RESOURCE_DET.source_name s_name FROM xx_tm_nam_terr_curr_assign_v terr_vw, JTF_RS_RESOURCE_EXTNS RESOURCE_DET, JTF_RS_ROLE_RELATIONS ROLE_ASSIGN, JTF_RS_ROLES_B ROLE_DET WHERE RESOURCE_DET.resource_id = terr_vw.resource_id AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_ID = RESOURCE_DET.RESOURCE_ID AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_ID = ROLE_DET.ROLE_ID AND terr_vw.entity_id = ps.party_site_id AND terr_vw.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' AND role_det.attribute14 = 'BDM' AND ROLE_ASSIGN.ROLE_RESOURCE_TYPE = 'RS_INDIVIDUAL' AND rownum = 1) END) primary_sales_person, (CASE NVL(sitedemov.SITEDEMO_CANCROSS,'-9X9Y9Z') WHEN '-9X9Y9Z' THEN '*'||hp.Attribute1 ELSE sitedemov.SITEDEMO_CANCROSS END) can_cross_sell, (CASE NVL(sitedemov.SITEDEMO_CONTACTFREQ,'-9X9Y9Z') WHEN '-9X9Y9Z' THEN '*'||hp.Attribute2 ELSE sitedemov.SITEDEMO_CONTACTFREQ END) conct_freq, (CASE NVL(to_char(sitedemov.SITEDEMO_WCW),'-9X9Y9Z') WHEN '-9X9Y9Z' THEN '*'||hp.Attribute10 ELSE to_char(sitedemov.SITEDEMO_WCW) END) white_collar_wrk, hp.party_type, hp.party_number, hp.tax_reference, hp.jgzz_fiscal_code taxpayer_id, hp.duns_number_c duns_number, hp.known_as known_as, hp.known_as2 known_as2, hp.known_as3 known_as3, hp.known_as4 known_as4, hp.known_as5 known_as5, hp.organization_name_phonetic, hp.person_first_name_phonetic, hp.person_last_name_phonetic, ps.location_id, terr.territory_short_name country, hp.url primary_url, fnd2.meaning certification_level_meaning, mpg.score, (mpg.score||'%') percentage, 'N' Select_flag, 'N' disable_hgrid_flag, 'Y' enable_hgrid_flag, ' ' source_system FROM hz_parties hp, hz_party_sites ps, fnd_territories_vl terr, fnd_lookup_values fnd2, hz_matched_parties_gt mpg, XX_CDH_S_EXT_SITEDEMO_V sitedemov WHERE mpg.search_context_id = :3 and mpg.party_id = hp.party_id and hp.party_type in ('PERSON', 'ORGANIZATION') and ps.party_id = hp.party_id and ps.party_site_id = sitedemov.party_site_id(+) and hp.country = terr.territory_code(+) and hp.status = 'A' and ps.status = 'A' and fnd2.lookup_type(+) = 'HZ_PARTY_CERT_LEVEL' and fnd2.language(+) = userenv('LANG') and fnd2.lookup_code(+) = hp.certification_level order by score desc
